name: Hamilton Beach 12-Cup Coffee Maker, Programmable Brewstation Summit Dispensing Coffee Machine
blurb: 12-cup programmable coffeemaker with insulated inner tank and no carafe
description: 48464 Features: -Coffeemaker. -Insulated inner tank with gentle heater to keep coffee fresh. -Brew bold, regular, small batch or iced coffee. -Adjustable auto shutoff provides customize settings from zero to four hours. -Programmable clock/timer. -Stainless steel control panel. Product Type: -Automatic machines. Color: -Black. Dimensions: -16'' H x 12.5'' W x 9.25'' D. Overall Height - Top to Bottom: -16'. Overall Width - Side to Side: -12.5'. Overall Depth - Front to Back: -9.25'. Overall Product Weight: -7.4 lbs.

name: FP Coffee Maker French Press Coffee Maker w/ Glass Carafe and Sturdy Metal Frame
blurb: FP Coffee Maker: Not just a great cup of coffee - quality you can count on and style you deserve.
description: The French Press Coffee Maker w/ Glass Carafe and Sturdy Metal Frame by FP Coffee Maker is exactly what you need in a coffee press, from consistently delicious, ground-free coffee to well-made, reliable parts. Not only are our products built to last, they are designed with style and elegance. The carafe has a modern look that will make a simple statement on your counter.

name: 6peas Lemon & Lime Squeezer
blurb: the Best Hand Held Manual Citrus Juicer. Made from Food Grade Stainless Steel with Lime Green Silicone Handles for Comfort. Easily Extract More Fresh Juice Now!
description: 6peas Lemon Squeezer is strong, efficient, easy to use and clean and looks great too! Made from durable, food-safe, 18/10 stainless steel, it has been designed with a strong and sturdy hinge to last a lifetime. Cheerful lime green silicone handles ensure you won't get sore hands when juicing.

name: Whirlpool - 24.8 Cu. Ft. French Door Refrigerator - Stainless Steel
blurb: There's a spot to keep all your groceries organized and accessible in this Whirlpool refrigerator. Temperature- and climate-controlled drawers keep foods fresh and ready to enjoy at any time.
description: Smart sensors maintain optimal temperature for food storage Accu-Chill temperature management system quickly gauges and adjusts the internal temperature to keep your food properly chilled.      Minimize freezer burn with Adaptive Defrost      Sensor-controlled defrost cycle runs only when needed to better preserve food.      Humidity-controlled crispers help extend the freshness of produce      Includes 2 half-width crisper drawers that extend the life of fresh fruits and vegetables, reducing waste.      Store larger items in the full-width pantry drawer      Use this temperature-controlled drawer to store a sheet cake or party platter without taking up room on a shelf.

name: Apple - 21.5`` iMac® with Retina 4K display - Intel Core i5 (3.1GHz) - 8GB Memory - 1TB Hard Drive - Silver
blurb: Apple iMac MK452LL/A All-in-One: iMac now offers a stunning Retina® 4K display on the 21.5`` model. And a wider color gamut means a palette of up to 25 percent more available colors. So photos and videos look crystal clear and vibrant, and text is razor sharp.
description: All-in-one design saves space and cuts clutter.  A full computer is housed inside the monitor, so you get all the power of a desktop in a streamlined design that involves fewer cables and takes up less space on a desk, table or kitchen counter.
